function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in bacterial community structure among faculty offices","Impact":"Potential for the spread of disease-causing bacteria","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, proper ventilation maintenance","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal lamps","People":"Occupants of the office spaces","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Strong association between spatial connectance distance and microbial community similarity","Impact":"Potential for disease-carrying microbes to spread between offices","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation, air filtration, strategic office layout","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, building control systems","People":"Occupants of the office spaces, building architects","Owner":"Building management"}]}
